description: Part of the Antinori estate, this restaurant has an elegant feel despite describing itself as an “osteria” (a more informal inn). It occupies an old site next to the old Badia di Passignano abbey ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Interesting wine list, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Maestro, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
